about_the_game:
You woke up from a dream, one that saw you journey to the top of the Lords’ domains and reach the ancient tree Batang Garing to save a mysterious girl. Unfortunately for you, you don’t remember anything else from your life and a mask covering your face prevents you from talking.

Get your memory back by exploring the domains of the Old Lords and discover the secrets behind the remnants of a past civilization. Face a deadly ecosystem that developed in this doomed land and slay giant monsters to get powerful enough to reach the summit of the ancient tree.

The magical lands of Bornean Mythology await you!



Explore the different domains of the Old Lords and discover mystical lands inspired by Bornean folktales. Glide, warp and jump across grassy plains, great lakes, floating islands and many more!

Engage in a fast-paced action game



Fight giant guardians’ beasts and monsters in this fast-paced action RPG. Chain stylish combos and get help from a mysterious fairy to put an end to their menace.

Unveil your destiny




Take control of a mute and amnesiac character whose destiny sets you on the road to the top of the lords’ domain to set a mysterious girl free. Find memory fragments during your exploration and find out what your life was before all of this.

A growing power




Upgrade your character in this action RPG by getting new abilities, crafting items to help you face enemies and solve puzzles in these dangerous lands. Think like an explorer and go on treasure hunts to find special items !

Uncover your past and reach the summit of Batang Garing!

JOIN OUR DISCORD SERVER

Get your memory back by exploring the domains of the Old Lords and discover the secrets behind the remnants of a past civilization. Face a deadly ecosystem that developed in this doomed land and slay giant monsters to get powerful enough to reach the summit of the ancient tree.

The magical lands of Bornean Mythology await you!



Explore the different domains of the Old Lords and discover mystical lands inspired by Bornean folktales. Glide, warp and jump across grassy plains, great lakes, floating islands and many more!

name: Buramato

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: WINDOWS 7,8,8.1,10 64-BIT
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-530
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 660 or ATI Radeon HD 7850
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Additional Notes: [System Requirement Not Final]

short_description: Explore a vast fast-paced Action RPG inspired by traditional Bornean mythology. Slay monsters with stylish combos and discover the Old Lords’ cursed lands to unravel the secrets behind your lost memory.
supported_languages: English, French, German, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, Spanish - Latin America, Japanese, Portuguese - Brazil
